nodes.name: Procore Invoice Webhook
nodes.notes: Receives Procore webhook events when new invoices/requisitions are created

nodes.name: Normalize & Fingerprint
nodes.notes: Normalizes vendor name, invoice number, and generates SHA256 fingerprint for dedup

nodes.name: Notion Dedup Check
nodes.notes: Query Notion Invoice Tracker for matching fingerprint

parameters.name: query
parameters.value: =SELECT * FROM Bill WHERE VendorRef = '{{ $json.qbo_vendor_id }}' AND TotalAmt = '{{ $json.amount }}' AND TxnDate >= '{{ $json.date_range_start }}'

nodes.name: QBO Dedup Check
nodes.notes: Query QBO for matching bills (same vendor + amount + date range)

boolean.value1: ={{ ($node['Notion Dedup Check'].json.results && $node['Notion Dedup Check'].json.results.length > 0) || ($node['QBO Dedup Check'].json.QueryResponse && $node['QBO Dedup Check'].json.QueryResponse.Bill && $node['QBO Dedup Check'].json.QueryResponse.Bill.length > 0) }}

nodes.name: Is Duplicate?
nodes.notes: Check if fingerprint was found in Notion or matching bill exists in QBO

nodes.name: Log Duplicate in Notion
nodes.notes: Create Notion entry marked as DUPLICATE DETECTED
